content:
I can reproduce issue 92885 locally on an AArch64 Linux host, but I have to build Clang and pass --run-clang-based-tests-with=... for the test to run at all. The CI doesn't set that option, though, so (if I understand correctly) all the tests that rely on clang get ignored. Was that a deliberate decision? Is there room to enable the clang-based tests?
At a glance, some might need additional filtering. For example, the test I'm playing with (run-make-fulldeps/cross-lang-lto-clang) also doesn't work on aarch64-apple-darwin but for reasons unrelated to #92885.
